sub_title: Commercial Director bij USP Marketing PR
summary:
Passionate and result driven communication professional with over 12 years of experience in PR, Marketing Events and Tourism. After studying tourism management, I worked in the travel industry for several years where I gained extensive in-depth knowledge of all elements related to PR and Marketing,  Destination and Event management and the implementation of successful trade, sales & marketing strategies. 

I travelled all over the world for a wellness tour operator to source and market spas and cure resorts and did flash sales for an international tour operator for four- and five-star hotels and package holidays where I was specialised in long-haul sales. 

After that I started to work for an international PR & Marketing agency where I did projects and full representation for clients such as the European Commission, Mauritius Tourism Promotion Authority, Singapore Tourism Board, Croatian National Tourist Board, Estonian Tourist Board and many more. My speciality is developing creative campaigns to increase brand visibility and awareness in the Benelux market with the main objective of boosting sales.

projects.title: Mice meets Metropolis
projects.description:
Research to Amsterdam and metropolitan area as MICE destination (Meetings, Incentives, Conventions, Exhibitions) and the challenges on the (inter) national business tourism market. 

Organization of the seminar ‘Mice meets Metropolis’ at estate Duin and Kruidberg Santpoort, to attract new potential entrants for the project Mice meets Metropolis. The seminar has provided knowledge to entrepreneurs on the international MICE market, attractive speakers as Frits Huffnagel and Hans Luijten has spoken and the entrepreneurs have followed interested workshops.

contributors.headline: Commercial Director bij USP Marketing PR

courses.name: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People (Franklin Covey)

profile_positions.description:
USP Marketing PR is a leading Amsterdam based PR and marketing agency. We support worldwide brands in lifestyle, aviation, tourism and hospitality to showcase their strengths, enhance their reputation and grow their business.  Our clients vary from established market leaders to start ups.

At USP Marketing PR, we use our expertise, industry knowledge and Benelux and international networks to connect aviation, tourism, hospitality and lifestyle brands with their target audience, to generate media endorsement and to increase audience engagement. Services are customized to craft the right content for the right audience segment at the right time in traditional and social media. 

Potential client inquiries
For more information on how USP Marketing PR may be able to assist you, please contact me at alexandra.vervoort@usp.nl. I look forward to exploring the opportunities for you!

Media
If you like to be added to the USP Marketing PR media list and receive media updates, please send an email to pr@usp.nl, with your contact details. Our team is dedicated to sharing the most recent news with you.

Website: https://usp.nl/uk-en
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director

profile_positions.description:
Representation and management for multiple brands in tourism, lifestyle and hospitality in Benelux market

Key tasks:
• Search, generate and pitch new business
• Development of proposals, marketing and promotional plans
• Creating and developing innovative marketing and communication strategies
• Identifies and secures standing opportunities
• Media buying
• Influencer marketing
• Integrated consumer cross media campaigns
• Database marketing
• Partnership Marketing Agreements
• Recommend new ideas to clients to upgrade their digital experiences
• Planning, organizing and coordination of b2b and b2c (virtual) events and workshops
• Organizing media events from scratch to after-sales
• Organize and coordination of FAM and press trips
• Develops and strengthens existing and new media relationships
• Tracks and reports on media activity
• Implements and maintains social media communities, campaigns and projects

Among others for the following clients:
- European Commission (Project - Partnerships in European; https://www.partnershipsineuropeantourism.eu/)
- Mauritius Tourism Promotion Authority 
- Oman Ministry of Tourism 
- Maldives Tourism Board 
- Croatian National Tourist Board 
- Singapore Tourism Board 
- Estonian Tourist Board 
- Costa Rica Futuropa
profile_positions.title: Senior PR & Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the supply of flash sales package holidays and hotel deals to ensure exclusive deals on the Benelux websites of Secret Escapes. 

•	Market research and identifying a pipeline that offers a constant diversity of products across Benelux. 
•	Acquisition and maintaining of partner hotels and tour operators
•	Negotiation with hotels and tour operators to get high discounted deals
•	Account management, working closely with the partners from the first approach to the published offer on the homepage
•	Manage all elements of the contracting process from target identification and initial contact right through to pricing, contract agreement and allocation- and market management
•	Create and calculate land packages with Secret Escapes contracted hotels 
•	Close exchange with the marketing, operation and sales teams in Berlin and London
•	Conduct research by analyzing available data and upcoming trends to be able to offer the right product at the right time.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager Benelux

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for sales, event and marketing of the company with focus on acquisition of new business clients that want to outsource their business travel and events. 

•	Developing and initiating sales and marketing strategies
•	Developing PR strategy and action plans
•	Redesigning the website
•	Acquisition of new potential client and maintaining relationship with existing clients
•	Plan and organize business events for clients
•	Make sure all events are carried out within budget and quality standard of the client
•	Negotiating the best available rates
•	Attending trade fairs abroad to promote the company
profile_positions.title: Sales Event Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the product and marketing department with focus on generating new business and increasing brand awareness.

•	Developing PR, social media, media and marketing strategy
•	Creating and implementing joint campaigns between hotels, media, tourism boards, clients and the company
•	Developing magazines
•	Acquisition and maintaining relationship with partners
•	Organizing press trips and events
•	Representing the brand on industry organizations and events
•	Coordinate and organizing events for partners and clients
•	Attending trade fairs abroad
•	Creating new business opportunities 
•	Finding new target groups and markets
•	Developing and initiating sales strategy
•	Initiating and renewing contracts 
•	Manage all elements of the contracting process 
•	Global purchasing
profile_positions.title: Product & Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Representative of the company
•	Generating new customers 
•	Ensuring guest satisfaction
•	Developing new packages to increase sales
•	Sales calls and presentations
